description:
Inami Mahiru is a waitress at Wagnaria, who harbors a deep fear of men, and will involuntary hit any man who comes too close to her. She is also freakishly strong despite her willowy appearance. Since Takanashi Souta started working at Wagnaria, she has been hitting him more frequently than others, a risk he takes so he can cure her androphobia.
[SPOILER]It turns out that Inami`s father is to blame for her behavior, since he brainwashed her into fearing all men and placed extra weights in her schoolbags which gradually increased her strength.[/SPOILER]
name: Inami Mahiru
